author: Kurzgesagt – In a Nutshell
description:
This video was sponsored by GiveWell. 
First-time donors will have their donation matched up to $100 at https://www.givewell.org/Kurzgesagt

Your support makes everything possible ❤️ It’s not too late to order your limited edition 12,025 Human Era Calendar here: https://shop.kgs.link/12025Cal

Sources & further reading:
https://sites.google.com/view/sources-allergies-and-worms/

Allergies are more than just overreactions – they might be an evolutionary relic from a time when worms invaded our bodies daily.

title: Why Giant Worms Are Responsible For Your Allergies
